attributes.additional_details: Imprisonment of up to 10 years and or a fine of up to 50 million pounds.
attributes.background: New law, for Corporate Bodies, Board Members, Rich Business People and Political members, who embarrass and damage the Country`s good standing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what behaviour you'd like to be defined as "bringing the country into disrepute". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
